channel.title: [Release] Open source, Horribly Written 2D RPG skeleton
channel.description:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/3cbvclw9m9ex33w/JGame.zip
Absolutely horribly written 2D game I was working on.
According to the project thread, here is a list of what I've done:
Terrain Easy Terrain Making/Editing Player Moves to where you click like RuneScape Strings displaying Health and Level on screen (why did I even add this hahahaha) Ability to change movement speed (durr) GameObject Managing Scrolling Camera Animated walking (needs work on sprites)
In Progress:
Object collision Right Click Drop Down Menu with Options
Not Done (Todo list):
Object Interaction Items Equipment GUI (inventory, etc) Combat NPC's
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/16k8bk3.jpg[/img]
I KNOW HOW BAD THIS IS WRITTEN, I DONT NEED YOU TO TELL ME IN THE COMMENTS no flaming

item.title: [Release] Open source, Horribly Written 2D RPG skeleton
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:60, topic:543389”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=662268.msg4439289#msg4439289 date=1406014251]
Don’t flame him ffs, at least he tried.
[/quote]
I think the OP brought it upon himself. Criticizing yourself in the way he did made it seem like he had no intent upon making it any better than it was, such as if he wrote it horribly on purpose.[/quote]
It was practically my first Java project I ever did. It was going nowhere so I released it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Open source, Horribly Written 2D RPG skeleton
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:49, topic:543389”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=662268.msg4426663#msg4426663 date=1401163200]
Uh when you guys join IRC don’t join and quit really quickly (really quickly being under an hour!!)!

As for documentation, here is an example:

[code=java]/**

  • {explanation here}
    */
    void someMethod() {
    …
    }[/code]

Pure_, explaining things you can google.

The great thing about it is, it can get really detailed and you can use little generators to auto-generate your docs into a web file for you!
[/quote][/quote]sinisoul, unable to use simple tags!

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Open source, Horribly Written 2D RPG skeleton
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Uh when you guys join IRC don’t join and quit really quickly (really quickly being under an hour!!)!

As for documentation, here is an example:

[code=java]/**

  • {explanation here}
    */
    void someMethod() {
    …
    }[/code]

The great thing about it is, it can get really detailed and you can use little generators to auto-generate your docs into a web file for you!

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Open source, Horribly Written 2D RPG skeleton
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:42, topic:543389”][quote author=Docent link=topic=662268.msg4426660#msg4426660 date=1401163019]Ohh! That! Thats what documentation is?? I do that all the time! I thought documentation was writing in a text file how the game works in its core or perhaps something like the runescape client wikipedia thing where it tells you client->server opcodes and stuff.
[/quote]

You could also call that documentation aswell, they’re pretty much the same concept, that is explaining what the code is meant to do.[/quote]

I see thank you so much.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Open source, Horribly Written 2D RPG skeleton
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

runescape sucks:

Besides, anyone who straight up steals codes would probably not be able to remake an entire game from a snippet of code either, and an experienced person would probably rewrite it in their own favor.

Pay special attention to this line.
Honestly, nobody has any reason to steal any code.
